lines.text: It's my daughter's right to listen to what her little heart says, and it just don't seem to say "Beetle".
I told you we belong here in the garden. The lady human said so. You heard her.
Gosh! And she knew my name.
Those Human Ones! Why, the way they're taking to tramping through the lowlands, it's getting so your life ain't worth a sunflower seed anymore. One never know who's gonna get it next.
It's no use to go, and don't forget I told you so!
Look at the Human Ones down there! They look just like a lot of little bugs!
You wouldn't hit a little guy with glasses would you?

[after Hoppity is hit with a live wire]
Hey look a *jitter bug*
